channel.title: bluetooth on Vishesh Handa's blog
channel.description: Recent content in bluetooth on Vishesh Handa's blog

item.title: Bluetooth Discovery
item.description: I just rediscovered this blog I’d found a long time back. It’s called Stevey’s Drunken Blog Rantsand it’s a really old blog. By really old I mean 4-5 years old - h . I had originally found it when I was googling ‘The Singleton Design Pattern’ and reading up on why it’s so bad and shouldn’t be used. EVER! (Unless you’re building a logging class.) Hereis a really nice summary, in case anyone is interested.
